definition: short and plump, pudding made of suet pastry spread with jam or fruit and rolled up and baked or steamed
details:
adjective
- short and plump
= synonyms: dumpy
noun
- pudding made of suet pastry spread with jam or fruit and rolled up and baked or steamed
= synonyms: roly-poly pudding
- a rotund individual
= synonyms: butterball
